title: Can we take a second to appreciate the artists that created new Evelynn skins' splash arts
body:
https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tgQRvnbKqU0/Wc6Tbdmo4mI/AAAAAAAAwQ0/kRNRWX9ZYX4LwE9v5kv-CgqYAyT-TZeugCLcBGAs/s1600/5a4e21845e6d51db.jpg

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AteXfJECNRU/Wc6TbSEf1bI/AAAAAAAAwQw/pIITN2jgn9Iq_PtF9M9czYBeA80VllEWQCLcBGAs/s1600/8847ce85acc0596f.jpg

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Uc0zejZmf1I/Wc6Tcaw12hI/AAAAAAAAwRA/A2S6rT9fUPkEsFbiKQSvKDWr_B7wSi8pgCLcBGAs/s1600/fb1ba2e3d49f7a70.jpg

Like all of there look fine as hell! I do not know who the artists were, but if any of you are reading this - great job! I would like if any RIOTER actually reveals the artists, because they deserve credit for this.

replies.body:
They're so beautiful!!! I honestly think they may be the best splash arts in the game right now.
The Base splash artist is: https://jessibean.artstation.com
The Shadow Evelynn splash artist is: https://www.artstation.com/7200ss
Kinda anyway, it seems they commissioned this person for the base art and then took his and finished it for the "official" version. But it's pretty much all him.
The other splash artists haven't been revealed yet!

Well I dont like the base splash artist for Evelynn.

Dont get me wrong she's amazing at drawing guys and beasts but when it comes to females she's really bad at it and can tell she does it because she doesnt want to lose her job.

You can spot all her female artwork by the way she uses the torso pose. start with the base art for sejuani then cruse around the other female skins and it's painfully obivious which ones she did.

but hey riot has her on payroll so it's not like what we say is going to change anything.

Your comment is a bummer, but I appreciate that you took the time to give feedback.  I am constantly practicing and working on my craft growth inside and outside of work because I want to get better.
I didn't work on Sejuani's base splash, Evelynn is my first.
I think it looks great, frankly some people have no eye for good art

> [{quoted}](name=Riot OwleyCat,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=e03B4rLx,comment-id=000000020001,timestamp=2017-10-04T21:03:11.276+0000)
>
> Your comment is a bummer, but I appreciate that you took the time to give feedback.  I am constantly practicing and working on my craft growth inside and outside of work because I want to get better.
> I didn't work on Sejuani's base splash, Evelynn is my first.

For what its worth, I think you did a great job and should be proud of it.

im not quite sure what you mean by "You can spot all her female artwork by the way she uses the torso pose. start with the base art for sejuani then cruse around the other female skins and it's painfully obivious which ones she did." this is her first full female splash other than Sakura Karma

Sorry I am late to this party!  (Been squashing Evelynn bugs and working on the next splash)  I am so very happy that these illustrations are getting love... and I can fill in your artist list :D

Evelynn's Promo Illustration: Zeen Chin https://www.artstation.com/zeen

Base Splash: Me (Jessica Oyhenart) https://www.artstation.com/jessibean
Shadow Eve: Sangsoo Jeong https://www.artstation.com/7200ss
Masquerade Eve: Andrew (Theo) Theophilopoulous https://www.artstation.com/theonides
Tango Eve: Bo Chen https://www.artstation.com/chenbo
Safecracker: Victor Maury (of Urgot and Galio fame) did the updates to the existing image https://www.artstation.com/victormaury

Thank you!!! <3 <3
EDIT: not surprised at all that the artist who did one of my favourite splash arts (Sun Goddess Karma) also did one of my new favourites (masquerade eve) What a wonderful artist!
Thank you very much! Looking all other work by these people felt so good!
No problem!

truthfully I enjoyed the original shadow evelynn skin that came out when she did. Which was just a flesh color vers of her base at the time before it got changed for the 3rd time. 

I like the face and the way he did shadow evelynn hands just the over all body style is lacking compared to the original shadow evelynn artwork
[http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=828563]
Tango's artist https://www.artstation.com/artwork/OlNKe
Thank you my friend! Tango splash is amazing, I will probably buy the skin as well after the model matches the splash colors
Oh it does match now, they recently added the update to the PBE :D
Noticed in the notes and the model looks nice. Even if i prefer the recolored version I hope they will release chromas - there were a lot of folks here, who said they prefer the blue version.
Yeah, they could do some really nice chroma effects with her skins.

That is true for most skins in the game. Tango would be nice, because of the open discussion  where there were fans on both color schemes. However I am not sure they are going to do chromas for 520 RP skin

I dunno. I don't think skins prices matter for what they make a chroma on.  I mean, I'd love to see some for quite a few 520/390 skins. I'd even like to see some for limited edition skins like Victorious which of course would only be available to those that own them but still it'd be cool if they did them there too.

Probably more likely to see them for what is in the store though than the various types that aren't.
from a business perspective chromas boost sales of skins, ans they benefit more from boosting expensive skins. Other than that - I agree
i LOVE masquerade eve's splash art, one of my favorite in the game
indeed, absolute beauty
But why is Evelyns base skin splash such an eye sore.  all her other splashes are so nice looking.  even the reveal was good.
Not sure about that, I think it is all about preferences. IMO it looks just fine

like the splashes of shadow and masquerade the most too. but ingame i would prefer masquerade. 

hope some ability color changes for some of the rest skins will come soon.
They f*cked up on the t!ts tho, she has double D's not C's....

> [{quoted}](name=Festive Bear,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=e03B4rLx,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-10-01T17:47:39.773+0000)
>
> They f*cked up on the t!ts tho, she has double D's not C's....

♿Festive Bear♿

The default skin splash is trash.  Sorry but its true.  It only caters to all the mindless 12 year olds who play this game who have no sense of good art.  She isn't 'hawt' she's ugly and shows absolutely no personality with that stupid cartoony smirk.  If he was going for sadism he failed from my point of view.  The one with TF is actually decent and the other two are nice.  Masquerade actually caputres the personality the best...but it reminds me of the Riddler or some other DC/Marvel comic book character I can't put my finger on.
